articles.author: Anthony D'Alessandro
articles.title: ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Fires Up Thursday Night With Around $23M In Previews – Box Office - Deadline
articles.description: 'Fantastic Four: First Steps' is posting $23M in previews, another robust start for superhero movies at the box office.
articles.content: EXCLUSIVE: No, silly, superhero movies aren’t dead. The second comic-book movie in the last two weeks, Disney/Marvel Studios‘ The Fantastic Four: First Steps is conquering around $23 million in previ… [+2711 chars]
